title: how do i make my league window size fit on my screen
body: i am playing league on desktop and i have it transmitted to my TV but i have to change my normal screen size just to fit league in and when i go to change the window size in game it gives me only the option that's too big for my screen plz help

replies.body: It may not auto-adjust, so you may have to change your resolution in-game while projecting it to your TV to fit.  Also keep in mind that if the tv is 4K then you can run into issues like this, and may need to change to a screen resolution lower than 1080.  I hope that helps!
